For the short  time I experienced the camera, I found the batteries held up well.  I never had any luck with cameras using  Double A batteries of any type, surprised many prefer the SX 160 over this updated version.

Reviews.Title: Fairly easy to use...
Reviews.Author: MichiganDad "markvp"
Reviews.Content: Came with lots of options of which I have to read through them all and see what they do.  It's a nice higher end point and shoot and even with my (slightly) shaky hand it delivered very clear video.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: paulina
Reviews.Content: I've just given it a trial run and it seems to be a very nice camera...I'm satisfied with the picture quality and zoom

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Carlos Alberto Silva
Reviews.Content: For the price this is an excellent point and shoot camera. Canon makes the best lenses on all there camera lines.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Christianna Buhr
Reviews.Content: It was described and I love the product. I would recommend this to any new camera buyer. What a great deal!

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera.
Reviews.Author: Chris Ciofalo
Reviews.Content: Ive been a Canon fan for a very long time. I needed to upgrade my camera when traveling to Peru. I got this for its optical zoom, HD video, and size. It does everything very well, but its still not perfect. It takes awhile to write a picture after you capture it. It also takes decent time to charge the flash. But its a inexpensive camera. And on that point it does everything as expected. I will be keeping it for quite some time.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera
Reviews.Author: Rohit Ahuja
Reviews.Content: I loved this camera. Got it @$99 only with free memory card its a great steal. Picture clarity is awesome.

Reviews.Title: What a steal only $99
Reviews.Author: cara
Reviews.Content: quality is great and I love all the features it offers. It's lightweight and fits snugly in my little hands.

Reviews.Title: Is a horrible camera-do NOT buy this camera
Reviews.Author: kf2923
Reviews.Content: I had an older digital camera that was only 6 megapixels.  I was planning to go on vacation and wanted to upgrade.  I bought this camera as I don't need anything fancy-just for some video and pics of my family.  This camera described it to be much better than it actually is.  Having 10 more megapixels than my old camera you would think the pics would come out much better.  They were worse.  Any motion made the picture blurry.  The flash was useless as even with it, not a single night pic I took came out.  I am returning this camera for a refund.  I would not suggest this camera for anyone.  My iphone 4 camera takes better pics and video than this camera.  A disposable camera probably would have produced better pictures.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera -
Reviews.Author: KT "KT"
Reviews.Content: The November 01, 2013 review was not very helpful and is quite unfair.  The is no such thing as a point and shoot camera that is "kids-friendly".  The review did not provide an alternative point-n-shoot model that is actually fast enough to capture kids' s movements.  Instead, the review compares it with an DSLR camera.  Duh, that's like comparing the speed of a Vw Beetle with a Porsche 911.  We bought three SX150s and one SX170 and they are excellent cameras.  They take exceptional pictures for a point-n-shoot camera.  The reason we gave the SX170 4 stars instead of 5 is because of the lacking of AA batteries.

Reviews.Title: terrible camera
Reviews.Author: STEVEN WOODS
Reviews.Content: Not worth the money, terribly slow, takes horrible pictures, tons of foggy pics, the flash is just terrible, makes the people bright white and the background dark. Can't go into my disappointment for this camera

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Carolina
Reviews.Content: The ca,era is excellent, I dont have anything bad about it. What i didn't like is that it does not come with memory card, nor USB cable, you need to buy separetly

Reviews.Title: I LOVE this camera!
Reviews.Author: Steven and Emily
Reviews.Content: This camera is great for numerous reasons.  It is very easy to use.  I didn't need any instructions.  It's really comfortable in my hand and it isn't too heavy.  The zoom works really well.  The pictures are beautiful.  I got the red camera and it's very bold.  I'm glad it was less expensive than the black one.  I like that videos can be taken in any setting, but there is also a video setting.the sound quality is very clear.  I could hear the neighborhood kids playing in the background of my video. I was surprised.  Technology has really come a long way.  The flash I have to manually lift.  It's something I have to get use to.  The screen is a little fuzzy too.  I love that the camera takes pictures so quickly.  My previous camera took forever and then some to snap a shot.  Anyone with kids knows that those adorable moments are gone in a blink.  I am so looking forward to chasing my daughters and niece around getting great pictures of them.  My youngest draughter's first birthday is coming up and I will have excellent pictures and video of her party.

Reviews.Title: Does the trick
Reviews.Author: @sh "@sh"
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my sister. Its packed with features and is very compact. Its quite handy with pretty high MP and optical zoom. Video feature also works very well. Very good non-SLR camera in general.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Dolores Rivera
Reviews.Content: My daughter absolutely loves her camera. It takes beautiful pictures! She really likes the way the pictures come out especially when she takes motion pictures

Reviews.Title: Good yet surprising
Reviews.Author: shane
Reviews.Content: I am using this camera for class and for the price it is a good camera. The camera came on time and it has givin me great pictures. I was surprised that the camera did not come with a USB cord.

Reviews.Title: Great all around camera
Reviews.Author: Robert Bell
Reviews.Content: Having its own battery instead of double A's saves room. Nice adjustment on LCD screen so its visible in daylight. Still has more features than the average person would use.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Katie Jeffcoat
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera. It takes clear pictures and easy to use. I would recommend it. we love the camera a whole lot better than the nikon cool pix that we had.

Reviews.Title: An OK camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Woodshop Man
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my wife. I use several Canon DSLR's, but she just wants to "point and shoot".This Canon is rather large but very light. It tended to feel a bit cheap.The photos were alright for the price of the camera, but nothing to get excited about.I returned it and bought the Panasonic Lumix DMC. It's $300 but it is very compact,takes great photos and is simple to use.The one additional pet peeve I had with this camera is that Canon does not supplyan owners manual. You have to download it from their website.

Reviews.Title: A Big Hit
Reviews.Author: D. A. Mikaelian
Reviews.Content: My husband was both surprised and pleased when he opened this camera on Christmas Day.  Our camera was so out of date we weren't using it any more, and we were letting events pass and babies in the family grow up into teenagers without pictures to record them.  I chose the Canon PowerShot because it was recommended by my niece, who is familiar with the different types of cameras available today. Though I am no expert, I can say that my husband got some good pictures this Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Cool Camera
Reviews.Author: Leah Cummings
Reviews.Content: It has a lot of features, great to use for beginners that want a 35 mm camera. Having fun with taking pictures. Awesome resolution, easy to use.  Very good buy.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Morris
Reviews.Content: The camera presented an easy to use format, quickly adaptable, and produced quality digital pix.  Downloads to computer with ease and works well with Apple's iPhoto program

Reviews.Title: Great for beginners!
Reviews.Author: Libny Lara
Reviews.Content: If you are interested in photography and can't afford a dslr right now you can practice with this great product from Canon with the manual mode, it has a great resolution and you can take great pictures even with the zoom.

Reviews.Title: Image quality questionable
Reviews.Author: B. Borstad
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a gift to replace a 10 year old Kodak entry level camera.  I thought the image quality would be awesome, its ok.  Its possible that a setting was correct.  It seems like the camera's shutter speed is too slow. Again it might be an issue with the user but I wasn't wowed like I expected.The optical zoom is great.  The image screen is very good.  I like the size of the camera as its easy to get a good grip.  I have a small canon digital elph that I use but for an older person with a arthritic hands I feel the Sx170 is good.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Jorge Luis Gutiérrez González
Reviews.Content: Great camera at a great price. This is not a professional camera, but it's an excellent day to day one. 16Mp are more than enough for everyday photos. The size is just perfect, you can carry it everywhere without the need for extra cases or bags.

Reviews.Title: Gift for my mom from my dad
Reviews.Author: Tisha Trice
Reviews.Content: This was a perfect gift for my mom. She is making the leap from film to digital finally and was terrified that there wasn't a camera out there that would be easy for her to ease into. This was a good purchase. Nice picture quality, not a lot of bells and whistles for her to figure out.

Reviews.Title: Excellent choice for elderly
Reviews.Author: Janice Adams
Reviews.Content: Compact, yet still larger/sturdier than most of the credit-card-thin cameras on the market now. Large screen. Colorful images on/near the buttons are easy to see. Wrist strap. User friendly. Ordered this as a Christmas gift for my elderly Mother to replace her ancient Kodak Advantix camera. Mom has no peripheral vision, gets confused occasionally, and resists newer technology unless we force her to use it (old camera is gone bye-bye now). I sat her down with this camera and manual, then hovered about while she practiced turning it off/on, placing/removing the battery and memory card, and taking photos. Still need to teach her how to delete photos, but so far she's impressed.

Reviews.Title: Great camera! Dont forget to add the free memory card to your cart!
Reviews.Author: Wesleybot "Wesleybot"
Reviews.Content: Camera takes quality photos! You need to adjust the settings some to get faster shutter speed but its is absolutely a great deal on a camera! Don't Forget to add the suggested memory card to your card along with this camera is you want the SD card for free!

Reviews.Title: What I expected so far.
Reviews.Author: bbkong
Reviews.Content: I got this camera to replace an identical model I got with my AMEX points that quit working after 30 days.When I contacted Canon repair they wanted the price of a new one to repair it so I just got a new one instead.One difference: it uses a rechargeable battery pack instead of the old one which used AA's like they were popcorn, so on that account, it's better.

Reviews.Title: useful
Reviews.Author: Izzy
Reviews.Content: I love how it's not too big,  I can take it anywhere with me.  I'm a beginner at this whole photography thing so I was a little disappointed to figure out you can't attach lenses to this camera... Well at least that's what I think. Other than that,  it's perfect for the price! Way smarter to purchase on here than anywhere else.

Reviews.Title: Have to pay extra for basic items.
Reviews.Author: Dean
Reviews.Content: Great camera, easy to use, takes excellent pictures... only reason I knocked off a point was because camera came with a battery charger, but not with a USB cord, Being a digital camera, only makes sense that it should come with USB cord. Also, did not come with any SD card, have to buy that separately too.

Reviews.Title: Beyond Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Crystelle Rodwick
Reviews.Content: It's perfect! As always canon outdoes itself. It's user friendly and super functional but can also be customized to suit your photography style. Best camera I've had yet!

Reviews.Title: Luddites, look elsewhere
Reviews.Author: Wray Mould
Reviews.Content: Some reviewers lament the change from AA batteries to proprietary lithium-ion compared with the previous model, SX160. Too bad! End-of-the-world hyperbole is so boring. Canon evidently decided the market for AA-dependent cameras is virtually dead outside the Third World. Canon can now design their electronics without the vagaries of various AA battery brands and types, eg, alkaline vs. NiMH.  Yes, the NB-6L battery costs more--so what else is new? If you don't like it, buy something else and leave me out of your crusade.Oh, and by the way, the SX170 is a great little point 'n shoot camera for the price, with manual controls if desired. I don't expect it to perform like my Canon 5D MkIII, but that one won't fit in my pocket. I like the SX170 for what it is, and I couldn't care less about its lineage.Update 12/7/13: As of this date, the SX170 is the #5 bestselling point-and-shoot camera on Amazon, while the SX160 is #32. It looks like the battery campaign against the new model is a flop.

Reviews.Title: A good buy for the money.
Reviews.Author: Roger D. Hrabe "coachh"
Reviews.Content: I like most everything about this camera.  The pictures have been great, and for the most part it is very easy to use.  I don't particularly like the fact that I have to raise the flash.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot SX170 IS Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: P, M. Buchanan "mspauly"
Reviews.Content: It's my own fault for not reading more of the description and being unpleasantly surprised when the camera came with a rechargeable battery and NO USB cable.  I guess companies cannot bear to leave their good products alone.  I have two Canon cameras that I used till problems developed and I liked them a lot.  Technology continues to march on, good or not.  Most people probably like rechargeable batteries, so make up your own mind.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Boon Chong
Reviews.Content: Great camera. This is my second one. Able to change out regular battery if battery out compare to Li-Ion battery, all function stop if battery is out

Reviews.Title: Picture Perfect
Reviews.Author: Ms. Browne
Reviews.Content: Takes the best pictures.  Only thing missing is an electrical charger which shold be included with this product.  Good buy.

Reviews.Title: canon powershot
Reviews.Author: T
Reviews.Content: I am still learning how to use the camera, but am very happy with the photos I have taken so far.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Jaime Rowland
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures especially for the price! The only problem is that you have to manually take out the flash but that's not really a big deal for me.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Andrés Saborío Matamoros"
Reviews.Content: Easy to use entry level camera! It has manual control and and use propietary internal rechargeable battery! It uses sd card for storage and it is not incluided, so be sure to order one before the camera arrives! The maximun picture quality is 16 megapixels, i've already test it and the quality is awesome, also it has a 16x optical zoom and 60x by software...

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot sx170IS Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: T J
Reviews.Content: I love the camera but I would like a guide to direct me to its many uses and This was not enclosed with the camera.  It would be very helpful to get this information to the customers.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot SX 170 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 16x Optical Zoom.
Reviews.Author: Robert Hayes
Reviews.Content: Great  range and ease of use.  Terrific resolution when shooting camellias and other garden scenes.  Instructions clear and simple to use.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot
Reviews.Author: Pa
Reviews.Content: I haven't been able to use it a lot as yet.  What pictures I have taken have been great.  The various features are great.

Reviews.Title: Decent camera
Reviews.Author: Muthu
Reviews.Content: This is a very decent camera that is suitable for people like me who like traveling and love to take pics. This is a very good camera for personal use - You could take natural pictures and videos with a good resolution. I personally like it. I'm giving it 4 stars because this product can still be improved.

Reviews.Title: Good point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: James Jeter
Reviews.Content: This is my first point and shoot camera.  It's easy to use and makes picture taking almost effortlessly.  I am enjoying getting great shots everytime I use it.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot SX170 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Karen B.
Reviews.Content: I got this as a Christmas gift, but I am having a hard time trying to figure out exactly how it works. I liked my old camera better. However, this one does take great photo's. I will just have to read the manual and figure this out more.

Reviews.Title: Canon Camera
Reviews.Author: Helen Huckabee
Reviews.Content: Love the camera.  Very easy to use. The zoom is great and takes picture in low light with out flash.

Reviews.Title: Mom loves it
Reviews.Author: Meredith Gadsby Peterson "queensgirl"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my 72 year old mother.  The screen is perfect for her, since it doesn't darken even in low light.  The controls are easy to operate, and are large enough for her to see.  This is much better than the smaller point and shoot she had before.

Reviews.Title: takes nice pictures
Reviews.Author: E. Duffy
Reviews.Content: Overall I like the camera for ease of use but the flash is manual and you need to put it up every time you need to take a picture were flash is needed.  I should have paid more attention and gotten a camera with an automatic flash.  The camera does take nice pictures and the zoom capabilities are great.  The Flash is my only complaint.

Reviews.Title: Like it alot! wanted to love it!
Reviews.Author: Rosa
Reviews.Content: The camera is great but the flash has to be manually lifted otherwise nothing. The camera bag is barely big enough for the camera and the battery charger does not fit if the camera is in the case. :(

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: ROLAND   MORIN
Reviews.Content: nice camera,it works very good and easy to use. just used it a couple of times but hopeing to use it on my vacation.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for What I Needed!
Reviews.Author: Victoria
Reviews.Content: When looking at cameras what I wanted most wasGood quality photos (ie at least 16MP so I could crop images with less blur and grain.)Fast shutter speedCompact sizeThis camera meets all my needs, and actually exceeds them. The quality is great, shutter speed is great, and much better than any other camera in its price range (that I've found anyway.) The size is a bonus for me, small, but not typical compact camera size small. I really like the pop up flash, and the fact that you can adjust how bright the flash is.Overall perfect, inexpensive, good quality camera for your everyday needs!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: shileno
Reviews.Content: Love it, take pictures a very clean and light and dark days, excellent flash, I really recommend it, great size like a professional one :)

Reviews.Title: Great value for the price
Reviews.Author: Donnetta Russell
Reviews.Content: I brought this camera so I could get pictures on my recent vacation and I had more than I needed. The picture quality was great but even more exciting was the HD videos. I was able to record some of the beautiful features of the places I visited and it was a pleasure to share the videos with other members of my family. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Dennis
Reviews.Content: Great Camera For an upgrade  &  just a point & shoot.  I have an older cannon 4 MEG still works fine it was time for a new one looked around  @ diff makes  still think cannon is better takes great pics. If you donot need all the whistles & bells this is the camrea for you.

Reviews.Title: New Red Camera a learning experience
Reviews.Author: moondimer
Reviews.Content: Thanks for asking, but I ordered this from a friend's computer and he's IRKED to receive requests for ratings and other associated "ads" following up.  Please direct to my account in future.  Thanks.  The camera is great.  I bought a new printer to support it and am not fully versed in actually connecting the two (wireless) to print.  But I'm very happy with the camera itself.  So far, only pet cat pictures.  But soon New Orleans and other Landlord-Related pics will follow.  Liked the discounts on SD card.  Incidentally already had a zipper case in red that fit it exactly with the battery charger.  Price phenomenal.  I noted price went $15 higher for red color shortly after I ordered mine.  Wish it had a neck strap.  It's much more solid feeling and VERY easy to use.  The flip-up flash is marvelous.  My previous cheaper cameras were fine but now obsolete.  They went "off-line" and I panicked.  This is a great replacement.  Would like more easy access to print, however, and hope I can educate myself to do so.

Reviews.Title: Thanks
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: LOVE my camera!! It has all the features that I need. I love going out and taking pictures.  Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot SX170
Reviews.Author: dbarb
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera as a replacement  for a smaller Canon camera I had gotten several years ago, I was pleased with the old cameras features and performance but began having problems with the shutter not opening fully which caused problems with pictures being partially covered. I decided it was time to upgrade and chose this model. I have taken several pictures of elk at a ranch close by and I am amazed at the detail I get taking these pictures of the wild elk using the zoom and the clarity is wonderful, showing lots of detail to these amazing animals. I am so happy I chose this model as the pictures of these fantastic animals look so professional, I can't wait to be able to take pictures of my yard this summer and pictures of my great granddaughter playing with my mini doxie! I would definitely recommend this camera to anyone who is not professional but want to attain professional quality pictures.

Reviews.Title: Canon camera
Reviews.Author: Sztanzie Trevino
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my boyfriend on his birthday/Christmas & he absolutely just loves it! He uses it all the time he's been making videos on it & turning them into a movie & uploads it on to youtube! It has good graphics also! :)

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: emily guerrero
Reviews.Content: takes great pictures. I bought it as a gift and the person I gave it to takes great pictures with it

Reviews.Title: Love it !
Reviews.Author: sdcarol
Reviews.Content: GREAT camera for the money, very easy to use, crystal clear pictures !  Would buy again and recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Nice but remember to get memory card
Reviews.Author: Victoria Kulpins
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera...I of course forgot to order a memory card so I had to go and get one plus remember you will either need a reader or cable to move the pics

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for the money
Reviews.Author: PolarBear605
Reviews.Content: I wanted an easy to use, reliable camera when my "good" camera started having issues.  This has lived up to expectations; it takes excellent pictures and the telephoto is very clear. My only complaint is that the zoom does just that...it is virtually impossible to s-l-o-w-l-y focus and frame with the telephoto.

Reviews.Title: Camera Didnot Take Lenses Giftee Wanted
Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: The camera was very nice, but the wrong Canon model. Giftee was looking for a higher model with more capabilities.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Michele Ostrander
Reviews.Content: I got this camera as a gift for my boyfriend and he thinks it is pretty great.  We are not professional photographers by any means, but it takes great pictures and is easy to use.  He likes that it is fairly compact and therefore can take with him on backpacking trips and even keep in his pocket.

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot
Reviews.Author: Laura M. Stroebel
Reviews.Content: Great. Worked exactly like I wanted, fast and clear. Love the color too.Very easy to operate and upload on the web.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powerchot SX179
Reviews.Author: sandra suarez
Reviews.Content: This digital camera is great. I just love all the pictures it takes. Love this camera and I will recommend it anyone and everyone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent little camera
Reviews.Author: Matapaloma
Reviews.Content: Bought this for the girl friend. She learned to use it in 10 minutes. Big view screen and amazingly sharp presentation. She was excited about it and took about 40 Christmas party shots. Only downside: dead battery right out of the box.

Reviews.Content: small and portable, simple features, easy to use.remember to check for a transfer cable (the one I bought did not come with one) and neither did the memory card.We bought this one for our mother who is 78 y/o and she was able to use it without problems.

Reviews.Title: Great

Reviews.Title: Just got it but so far it is very good

Reviews.Content: This camera takes great pictures. I have not used it enough to determine the battery life but I ordered 2 extra for extended use. It should be an excellent upgrade from my older Canon which when for a swim and still worked well for several years with just a few minor problems.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera
Reviews.Author: Juan Garzon
Reviews.Content: I like it because take a perfect pictures, the zoom is awesome, the pictures are clear, I travel with this everywhere and take a lot of pictures.

Reviews.Title: Gift for my Fiance
Reviews.Author: Laura "redone"
Reviews.Content: He loves it. He had a small Canon camera that he used constantly, but it stopped serving his needs. This camera is perfect..small and very accurate.

Reviews.Title: Cannon SX170
Reviews.Author: Robert Schineller
Reviews.Content: I chose it for cost.  I bought as a replacement for 12 year old cannon.  Use it namely for taking pictures for Ebay sales and it works great.

Reviews.Title: Great Intermediater Camera
Reviews.Author: J. Abrams
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera as a gift for a 13 year old.  She was thrilled to move beyond simple point-and-shoot.  Easy enough to use, but lots of nice features to make photography a bit more sophisticated.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot SX170
Reviews.Author: Terry
Reviews.Content: My son bought this with his savings.  He loves it!  It has some great features, is easy to use and takes high quality photos.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Ronald Bermel
Reviews.Content: Really like the camera, would have appreciated a little more instruction without having to go online for information on the operating basics.

Reviews.Title: Joyous
Reviews.Author: me
Reviews.Content: What a joyous event, holiday gift giving. The wife needed a new camera and this one fit the bill completely. She is happy, ipso fact, I am happy.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for not much money

Reviews.Content: Works great especially with a tripod.  For the price it is a good camera, does not take the best action shots though.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for not much money

Reviews.Title: Great Camera

Reviews.Content: Great pics...very friedly use. The clarity and color of the photos are amazing! I use indoor and outdoor scene and work very nice.

Reviews.Title: Just as described!
Reviews.Author: Kasey D Jolly
Reviews.Content: A wonderful camera with the perfect setting…AUTO! As I learn more I will be able to use the awesome functions but as of now, it's perfect just using the Auto setting!

Reviews.Title: Great gift!
Reviews.Author: Linda Vasquez
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera as a gift and they love it! Easy to use, takes awesome pictures. You won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: cannon powershot
Reviews.Author: teresa lucas
Reviews.Content: nice camera for the price. takes clear pictures and is easily to use. also takes videos which makes it nice two in one.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot Review
Reviews.Author: sonia  macario
Reviews.Content: I have used Cannon cameras for the last 20 yearsI love how uncomplicated they areMy first Canon was an SLRI like  a camera that is smaller,lighter to carry aroundI have found that in this camera

Reviews.Title: VERY GOOD!! EXCELENT!!!
Reviews.Author: vanessa
Reviews.Content: I'M VERY AGREE WITH THIS CAMERA, SHE IS COMPACT, BUT THE QUALITY OF THE PHOTOS AND VIDEOS NOT LOSE MUCH OF A CAMERA SEMI PROFESSIONAL IS EASY TO USE, THE MENU IS NOT FOR NOTHING COMPLICATED, BATTERY HOLD MANY PICTURES BUT THESE Sean TAKEN WITH FLASH. I LOVE PHOTOGRAPHY AND THIS IS A CAMERA THAT WITHOUT BEING PROFESSIONAL ALLOWS YOU TO TAKE STUNNING PHOTOS AND EXCELLENT QUALITY, I'M VERY SATISFIED WITH THIS PRODUCT, WE RECOMMEND, EL ZOOM HAS A SCOPE INCREDIBLE PICTURES TO TAKE FULL MOON WITH AN IMPRESSIVE QUALITY LOOK AT ALL THAT IS SOMETHING INCREDIBLE CRATERS.

Reviews.Title: This is a great camera for a beginner
Reviews.Author: Sixaola
Reviews.Content: While I don't consider myself an expert on photography, I have spent some time in learning photography and have been making the most our of my old Canon camera.My wife has wanted to learn photography, but going to take pictures with just one camera is annoying, having to take turns.I decided to give this one as a gift this past Xmas and it she just loved it.The camera is small, you can definitively identify it as a compact camera. You can easily hold it with one hand as it is very light.It comes with quite a nice sensor considering the size of the camera. I tested taking some pictures at night and of fireworks and they look pretty amazing.The camera offers all the quirks to learn how to handle more powerful and professional cameras. While you can use the automatic and preconfigured settings that are normal on compact cameras (like portrait pictures, or night pictures), you have access to the Manual (M), Speed (Tv), Aperture (Av) and Program (P) settings which allows you to more properly set the camera to take pictures you want. Mirroring most of its big sisters, this camera has nice controls over white balance and flash intensity, for example.The camera may seem small, and yes, it is pretty limited when compared to other more expensive options, but for someone who wants to learn, or for someone who is looking for a smaller, cheaper side camera, I think this is a perfect option.The only reason I took 1 star out is that I like to have a viewfinder besides a LCD screen. I know for many photographers is a must and it is for me, but this is a small point considering the kind of camera.My wife is very happy and she also loved the color.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: S.M. Hughes "lady blue"
Reviews.Content: this was a gift for my grandson ... he's taking up photography after his father, who loves shooting pix.  he seemed very happy to receive it!

Reviews.Title: Headline
Reviews.Author: Donna Martin
Reviews.Content: It was not as big has I expected it to be have to this small already need a bigger one.

Reviews.Title: Taking time to stabilized image
Reviews.Author: vaibhav
Reviews.Content: Zooming function not working as required and to get stabalize image takes time.Flash also not very strong.SX160 is better than this camera.

Reviews.Title: A true peace of quality made by Cannon
Reviews.Author: Kurt
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased as an upgrade from a cannon SX 160 is which uses AA batteries which uses far to many batteries. The cannon SX 170 is has its own dedicated battery and I am very pleased with its long battery life. Have taken many photos any yet have had to recharge the battery. Great Camera.

Reviews.Title: Red is really beautiful.
Reviews.Author: Sun Woosung
Reviews.Content: I bought well in a really good price.Red is really beautiful.It is smaller and lighter than I thought.It is to be satisfied if you buy it.

Reviews.Title: dont buy!
Reviews.Author: JEFFREY WILKINSON
Reviews.Content: Bad pictures. viewscreen gritty. camera did not meet any expectations of person i gifted it to. tried another more expensive canon with no luck. ended up with a nikon coolpix.

Reviews.Title: Two major cons
Reviews.Author: Greg Hosilyk
Reviews.Content: I can't claim this is a thorough review, I only played with the camera for a few minutes, but that was enough to put it back in the box. There were two things that were deal breakers:1. Manual flashYou have to flip the flash up to use it. Some may like this, but I much prefer to set the camera to auto flash and if it needs it, it pops up and flashes. This may seem petty, but I was giving this camera to a grandma, so it needs to be as simple as possible.2. SLOWThis camera, even under good light, was slow to take a photo, good luck taking pictures of kids or pets.The other "problem" was the battery. Normally, I would prefer the removable battery and separate battery charger. I like that on my cameras, because I always buy a spare. But this camera was supposed to be for a grandma so, this feature only complicated things. So, this is only something that is worth mentioning, it may be a pro or a con for you.

Reviews.Title: no instructions
Reviews.Author: Frankie
Reviews.Content: I would probably love it if it came with clear directions on how to work ithaven't turned in pics to be developed yet

Reviews.Title: Disappointed.
Reviews.Author: John A.Negron
Reviews.Content: There were no directions on how to use it and what features it has.The spare battery does not hold a  charge.screen fussy some times.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Barbara J. Teall
Reviews.Content: Camera is great BUT they advertised it to be with regular batteries which is what I was looking for but it is rechargeable batteries instead ... that was a downer on it but camera is easy to understand and use so that part a plus

Reviews.Title: love my new camera
Reviews.Author: Diane G. Fiedorczyk "obxdiane"
Reviews.Content: So much nicer than my old canon camera with only 3 MP, Should have upgrade sooner. Love Canon products !

Reviews.Title: perfect gift
Reviews.Author: nettalovesjesus41
Reviews.Content: I chose the rating because the camera is everything they said it would be. I would recommend this camera for anyone who wants great quality pictures at a reasonable price. I would definitely purchase another one my husband lives it I got it for him for Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Carla
Reviews.Content: Received my camera today and I am satisfied. Firstly I was impressed with the shipping. I bought this on Friday evening and it arrived on the following Wednesday. Impressive since I don't live in the US. This is my first camera with a rechargeable battery and was a bit skeptical because of some of the reviews, but the battery charged quickly. Took my first shots and the quality is amazing. It didn't have a delay like the previous version.The only reason I'm not giving this camera 5 stars is because I haven't tested it for night shots and it didn't come with a data cable. Other than that I'm loving this camera. It's getting dark here soon...so I'm off to play with my new toy. Will update my review a bit later.

Reviews.Title: Mediocre at best
Reviews.Author: G
Reviews.Content: I don't know why the rave reviews for this camera.  I have personally found that this thing is constantly letting me down.Low light pictures:  Horrible, grainy, not even worth trying.Daylight pictures: Over saturatedPortraits: Comparable to my smart phone, meaning not worth the price tag on this camera.Resolution:  16MP @ 4:3 Aspect ratio.  Meaning few MP at resolutions people actually use.Autofocus:  Hope you like playing games trying to get the camera to focus on the correct thing in distances photos.  Anything over 25 feet good luck.Screen:  Clunky, fuzzy, pixilated, gigantic power hog.  Not a fair replacement for a classic viewfinder.Buttons:  The buttons are a bit wonky.  The "ok" button actually says "func. set" on it.  The flash button doesn't do anything on the default settings.  I can't figure out how, if possible, to delete multiple pictures at once.Battery:  Actually not bad, except that you have to remove it to charge it thereby reseting the date/time and several other settings.Other Features:  No WiFi, not the typical mini USB plug, flash needs be manually deployed, confusing menus, limited manual adjustments, basically disappointment all round.  This camera is barely a notch above a smart phone, the only thing that is an improvement is the optical zoom, and even that is a bit flaky.To be completely honest, I bought this a quick/cheap replacement for the Nikon S9700 I lost in an airport.  That camera took gorgeous photos and was absolutely fluid to use.  I know it is almost double the price, but I am returning this Canon and buying another S9700.  The S9700 is literally the total opposite of this camera on ever case listed.  Supports WiFi, standard mini-usb, plugin the camera to charge, intuitive user interface, solid low light photos, precise and responsive optical zoom, gorgeous LCD, accurate color, auto-popup flash, etc.Bottom line:  This camera after 3-days I hate it.  Nikon S9700 after 3-days I loved it, but lost it in the damn airport.

Reviews.Title: It's ok..
Reviews.Author: WM "mrbillz"
Reviews.Content: I replaced my SX10S with this but I'm not really happy with it.  It does take good pictures but it is lighter and, for me, not as comfortable to hold.  I'll probably donate this somewhere and buy a better camera.  Not sure if it will be Canon.

Reviews.Title: No AA battery kills what is otherwise an exellent camera
Reviews.Author: Erich Maria Remarque
Reviews.Content: Specification wise this camera is EXACTLY the same as SX160. The only difference is that the SX170 no longer takes AA batteries. Instead, it uses a proprietary battery. This pretty much destroys any portability the older SX models had. If my battery dies, that's it. You can't just walk into a store and buy a new set of cheap AA widely available batteries. Nope. You better had bought an additional Canon proprietary battery that will set you back nearly $40, AND you better made sure you charged it on the proprietary Canon charger.This is completely unacceptable. They took the one feature that made the SX160/SX130 series appealing and destroyed it. I guess I'm going to get an SX160 while they're still in stock.What a letdown. :(

Reviews.Title: It ain't great but it's better than garbage.
Reviews.Author: Vomit "Vomit"
Reviews.Content: I found this camera acceptable.  It was a gift for the wife, so I am not expecting it to last long.  It has a horrible demise in front of it, being a) left out in a driving rainstorm b) dropped at a party or c) thrown in anger.But other than that it takes nice pictures.

Reviews.Title: Losing AA battery power is a deal breaker
Reviews.Author: F28Pilot "Steve"
Reviews.Content: Decent camera for the money but losing AA battery power makes it too much of a hassle to find a charger and keep a spare battery around.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShotSX170 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Robert Eberly
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 20 year old son for his birthday. He took some excellent pictures the first day he got it . He went hiking in the woods and took a picture of the lake at the bottom,he then used the zoom and was able to see many things he could not see in first picture. He is now in Europe travelling to five different countries and has taken 400 pictures in the first ten days. Excellent camera quality and price wise.

Reviews.Title: Product is not complete!!
Reviews.Author: Luis Mendoza
Reviews.Content: It is a very good camera but the day when I bought it, was in a prommotion that included the camera and a completely free 16 GB memory card but I received the marvellous camera but never receive the 16GB memory card. For this reason I give you 3 stars.

Reviews.Title: Watch out for the free SD card offer it's not Automatic
Reviews.Author: T. Meehan "Hawaiitom"
Reviews.Content: It has nothing to do with the camera Amazon says get a free 16 GB SD card with this order. I didn't get the card when I asked Amazon they told me I needed to return the Camera and re order. I agreed then I go to order and the camera went up in price so I would have to pay more for the reorder. more than the SD card cost. The SD card offer was valid when I placed my order I just didn't click on it to add it to my order I mistakenly assumed it was included as it clearly stated:Free 16GB Memory Card with the Purchase of This Camera Purchase the Canon PowerShot SX170 and get a free Sandisk 16GB memory card when you buy from Amazon.com.Be careful is you order this camera that you don't get screwed too.

Reviews.Title: Review on my Canon PowerShot SX170 16.0 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Barbara Wilkey
Reviews.Content: Very good service from Amazon, camera came sooner than I expected and I like the camera very much, just wish there was an instruction book with it.  That is most definitely frustrating.

Reviews.Title: I hope to revise this review but...
Reviews.Author: Andrea Louise Todaro
Reviews.Content: ... I am waiting to see if customer service follows through as promised.  I read the ad that said Free Memory Card with Purchase.  The camera arrived with no memory card.  I looked at the ad again, and thought perhaps I had missed a step in the fine print.  Sure enough, it seemed to indicate that I needed to add the memory cart to the basket... so I tried placing a camera and memory card in a new basket together, but it would not give me the option of a free memory card... it wanted to charge the advertised price for the memory card... so clearly that was not the issue either.  I called customer service and was told that they will provide me with a return label for the camera I received, and will ship out a new identical camera, with a memory card, with expedited shipping so that I will have it Tuesday.  (Today is Friday).  So if the new camera and card arrives Tuesday, I hope to post an update.  Not sure why they could not just send a memory card, but I will take this as a sincere effort to fix the problem.

Reviews.Title: deceptive purchase criteria
Reviews.Author: warthoggy
Reviews.Content: when purchasing a mention was made for a free memory card which I assumed was automatic .When received minus the memory card I revisited the site and discovered you had to request the card separately .wonder if any one else found this tactic deceptive ..

Reviews.Title: NO MEMORY CARD??
Reviews.Author: gregory
Reviews.Content: No memory card included so the camera is just a nice looking hunk of plastic that won't take photos. Is this what we call upsell inc.???

Reviews.Title: Doesn't come with memory
Reviews.Author: Nathan A. Moore
Reviews.Content: I'm EXTREMELY IRRITATED! The product description says it comes with a free 16GB memory card if you purchase from amazon.com, well I purchased the specific camera from amazon.com and there is no memory card. At this point I don't want to keep my prime subscription because Amazon just puts lies on products.
